page.title: 03Education in South Bradford.
page.content: Our 'block' contains part of two Education Authorities,{Bradford and} {Kirklees.}Bradford has a three tier system of education. Children enter {First School}at the age of 4 and leave at 9.9 to 13 is the age of{Middle} {School}children and the{Upper Schools} accept children until age 19.Many schools in Bradford are over 100 years old and the buildings are showing signs of deterioration.Some schools have been demolished and new ones built to replace them.Almost all the new Upper Schools have problems with their flat roofs and Bradford now has a policy that no new school will be built with a flat roof.Kirklees inherited a mixed system of education at the Local Government reorganisation in 1974 and has both{Junior}and{Middle Schools.It also system of{Sixth form} {colleges.}
